column5: WELL I HAD A DOCS APPT TODAY AND ENDED UP WITH 2 HRS TO KILL BEFORE I GOT LITTLE C!!! SO SOME HOW MY ROD WAS IN MY CAR SO I WENT FOR A FEW DRIFTS!!! SOME REAL SHINY FISH HERE!!! THEY DONT GET ANY MORE CHROME THEN THIS!!! (ANOTHER BIG FAT HEN AGAIN TODAY)
very nice.. great job again cc

man o man, i think you really should go back to work CC ... for the following reasons ...  1) all the steelhead would be able to take a break from eating your speical bait and start spawning (lol) 2) you would not get any PM with profanity and offensive words sent from jealous/angry people as the one i was about to send out  just kidding  don't mind me, i am jealous though, stupid work  once again great report!..
Nice chromers. Looking to get out on the water friday hope they clear up by then. How was the water clarity today?

Scott....well, I'm at a loss for words here.  No matter what kind of conditions....choc milk, gin clear, you bring them in every time you go out!  Awesome looking fish there!  Xrap...I'd assume the waters were gin clear today....gonna get bad tomorrow I would think since the rain is supposed to continue until the afternoon....Friday may be ok with a bit of luck...I'm assuming Sat or Sun may be prime conditions again.
Next time, I'll put on my sunglasses  Thanks, now I'm jealous and blinded.  Tony
awesome chromers..keep em coming..  i bet your not looking forward going back to work lol
Wow ... that is STRAIGHT out of the lake !!!  Nice !
CC ... don't you do anything but fish and post pictures .... Sheesh.    Great to see folks gettin' out there ... hope I can get some time before long.  Congrats !
have u ever been skunked?lol  great job
tx all!!! and yes ive been skunked  lol!!! back to work soon for me!!!
Thanx for the Pics CC.  You know its a good thing your not registered for the OFC fishing tournament because alot of teams would be lagging behind yours.
As always, good report and thanks for sharing
:wallbash:  :wallbash:  :wallbash:  :wallbash:  :wallbash:  I still have 2 weeks before I hit the rivers.
RIDICULOUS!  CC, you've got talent!  In TUNE with the fish.  Great report as always.
What can I say.......  !!!!  Great job Scott!!! Thanks for sharing!   Bly
Just re-read your post and looked at the pics....didn't you mean an appointment at the "docks"??? LOL.
